rev.desc.rev.desc: remove panel check.query
add variable $L.timeout.needed to enable/disable query timeout
modify the panel set.viewsearch to fix the joined table search issue
Add a parameter and pass view define into to implement the vew search
Roll back the modifications of logical name solution, the logic is handled in RTE instead

Replace select panel by fselect function to get search colunms before doing select, this is for logical name solution purpose. RTE will decide if needs do cross-table query based on the search columns
Add "append query", and make it invisible in "inbox" records
when query change or task, if profile has append.query, add append.query to query sql.
QC8315, Searching with 'View' is not working in Change Management.
add new param "Process append query:" / name, update start panel and patch.query.
Don't process an invalid advanced query.
Recompile to fix broken parameter.
Added hook for advanced find query.
Removed the append query since that was being done in cm3.query.build.
Updated to work with cut through. It will now use passed in query instead of using qbe panel to construct the query.
Also removed from setup.search.go:
Removed the following expressions from setup.search.go:
* $L.save.assign=assignment in $L.file;1 in $L.void=assignment in $L.file
* if (not null(assignment in $L.file) and $search.assign.flag="secondary") then (secondary.assignment in $L.file=$L.void)
* if (not null(assignment in $L.file) and $search.assign.flag="secondary") then (assignment in $L.file=NULL)
* $L.site=$pmc.search.site
* open in $L.file=val($cm3.open.flag, 4)
On start, added checks on $cm3.created.before and $cm3.created.after to ensure that dates are entered.
Fixed patch.query to base the Created After and Created Before queries off the orig.date.entered field.

descript.descript: remove panel check.query
add variable $L.timeout.needed to enable/disable query timeout
modify the panel set.viewsearch to fix the joined table search issue
Add a parameter and pass view define into to implement the vew search
Roll back the modifications of logical name solution, the logic is handled in RTE instead

Replace select panel by fselect function to get search colunms before doing select, this is for logical name solution purpose. RTE will decide if needs do cross-table query based on the search columns
Add "append query", and make it invisible in "inbox" records
when query change or task, if profile has append.query, add append.query to query sql.
QC8315, Searching with 'View' is not working in Change Management.
add new param "Process append query:" / name, update start panel and patch.query.
Don't process an invalid advanced query.
Recompile to fix broken parameter.
Added hook for advanced find query.
Removed the append query since that was being done in cm3.query.build.
Updated to work with cut through. It will now use passed in query instead of using qbe panel to construct the query.
Also removed from setup.search.go:
Removed the following expressions from setup.search.go:
* $L.save.assign=assignment in $L.file;1 in $L.void=assignment in $L.file
* if (not null(assignment in $L.file) and $search.assign.flag="secondary") then (secondary.assignment in $L.file=$L.void)
* if (not null(assignment in $L.file) and $search.assign.flag="secondary") then (assignment in $L.file=NULL)
* $L.site=$pmc.search.site
* open in $L.file=val($cm3.open.flag, 4)
On start, added checks on $cm3.created.before and $cm3.created.after to ensure that dates are entered.
Fixed patch.query to base the Created After and Created Before queries off the orig.date.entered field.
